name: MC-MCD
paper: Outlier detection in the multiple cluster setting using the minimum covariance determinant estimator.
description: MC-MCD is a framework where, following a robust clustering step, each cluster is analyzed using robust distance measures based on cluster-specific MCD estimates. They derive the theoretical distribution of these robust Mahalanobis distances for effective outlier identification within each cluster, even when clusters differ in size and shape.
